title: BlackRock’s Rieder Sees Bond Manager ‘Nirvana’ in European Debt
description: BlackRock is loading up on European bonds, using currency hedges to boost returns in what Rick Rieder calls “a nirvana for a bond manager.”
content: BlackRock is loading up on European bonds, using currency hedges to boost returns in what Rick Rieder calls “a nirvana for a bond manager.”
